titleStmt.title: A famous dittie of the ioyful receauing of the Queens moste excellent maiestie, by the worthy citizens of London the xij day of Nouember, 1584. at her graces comming to Saint Iames. To the tune of Wigmores Galliard.
titleStmt.author: Harrington, Richard, ballad-writer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Allde for Yarath Iames and are to be solde in New-gate Market against Christ Church gate,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "The twelfe day of Nouember last,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: New-gate Market against Christ Church gate
